Interface com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.IService
Inherited members: ShowHide
Deprecated: ShowHide
com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface IService

  • public interface IService
    Some calls within Virtuoso require direct communication with the background download service. These calls consist of pausing / resuming downloads, ascertaining current status of the service and retrieving network throughput data. This interface provides the means for clients to create a persistent connection only when they need it. Use this interface to:
    • Pause Downloads.
    • Resume Downloads.
    • Retrieve the current status.
    • Determine the real-time download performance during the last 15 seconds.
    • Determine the download performance average for the currently downloading asset.
    • Determine the download performance average for the overall engine.
    This interface can be accessed through a call to getService of Virtuoso.

        Throws:

        void pauseDownloads() throws ServiceException
        Stop Virtuoso from downloading. This will move Virtuoso into a PAUSED state.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - Thrown on a RemoteException or when there is no connection to the service.
        See Also:

        abstract void resumeDownloads()
        Move Virtuoso out of paused state.
        void resumeDownloads() throws ServiceException
        Move Virtuoso out of paused state.
        Allows downloads to proceed, as long as Virtuoso is not blocked on other conditions.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - Thrown on a RemoteException or when there is no connection to the service.
        See Also:
        Common.EngineStatus
      • Measuring Throughput 
        Modifier and Type Method and Description
        getCurrentThroughput 
        abstract double getCurrentThroughput()
        Current download speed (instantaneous value) for the current asset.
        double getCurrentThroughput() throws ServiceException
        Current download speed (instantaneous value) for the current asset.
        Returns:
        Download speed of current Asset (in Mb/s)
        Throws:
        ServiceException - Thrown on a RemoteException or when there is no connection to the service
        See Also:
        getWindowedThroughput(), getOverallThroughput()
        getOverallThroughput 
        abstract double getOverallThroughput()
        Overall download speed for the current session.
        double getOverallThroughput() throws ServiceException
        Overall download speed for the current session. This is an overall average and provides a general estimate for the long-term downloading performance on a given network. Virtuoso resets this value when the download service itself is restarted.
        Returns:
        Download speed of current session (in Mb/s)
        Throws:
        ServiceException - Thrown on a RemoteException or when there is no connection to the service
        See Also:
        getCurrentThroughput(), getWindowedThroughput()
        getWindowedThroughput 
        abstract double getWindowedThroughput()
        Windowed download speed for the current asset.
        double getWindowedThroughput() throws ServiceException
        Windowed download speed for the current asset. This is an average based on a 15 second sliding window for the currently downloading asset. Virtuoso resets this value when it begins downloading a new asset.
        Returns:
        Windowed download speed (in Mb/s)
        Throws:
        ServiceException - Thrown on a RemoteException or when there is no connection to the service
        See Also:
        getCurrentThroughput(), getOverallThroughput()
